title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Restructured Actions documentation: Renamed and reorganized files for creating/publishing actions, updated redirects and indexes.
Added enterprise IP allow list requirements for SSH/PAT authorization in organizations.
Enabled Dependabot org-level private registries configuration.
Added Gemini model prompt caching details and updated Copilot content exclusion limitations (excludes symlinks/remote repos).
Set repository policy rules preview limits (75 max per org/enterprise).
Fixed markdown syntax in ruleset notes.
Filtered metadata permissions in GitHub Apps docs when combined with other permissions.
summary:

- Added enterprise IP allow list requirements for SSH/PAT authorization in organizations.
- Enabled Dependabot org-level private registries configuration.
- Added Gemini model prompt caching details and updated Copilot content exclusion limitations (excludes symlinks/remote repos).
- Set repository policy rules preview limits (75 max per org/enterprise).
- Fixed markdown syntax in ruleset notes.
- Filtered metadata permissions in GitHub Apps docs when combined with other permissions.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Restructured Actions documentation: Renamed and reorganized files for creating/publishing actions, updated redirects and indexes.
- Added enterprise IP allow list requirements for SSH/PAT authorization in organizations.
- Enabled Dependabot org-level private registries configuration.
- Added Gemini model prompt caching details and updated Copilot content exclusion limitations (excludes symlinks/remote repos).
- Set repository policy rules preview limits (75 max per org/enterprise).
- Fixed markdown syntax in ruleset notes.
- Filtered metadata permissions in GitHub Apps docs when combined with other permissions.

### Title
Docs: Restructure Actions, Add Auth Notes, Dependabot Registries, Copilot Updates
